d.

Tamara earns money babysitting and doing chores.

She saves 25% of what she earns.

Write different expressions to represent the amount Tamara saves based on the amount she makes babysitting and doing chores.

Tamara's Earnings ($) Tamara’s Savings ($) Expression 1 Tamara’s Savings ($) Expression 2 Tamara’s Savings ($) Expression 3
\(Babysitting: 40\), \(Chores: 20\)
\(Babysitting: 100\), \(Chores: 80\)
\(Babysitting: b\), \(Chores: c\)
